results.title: Danke schoen
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI secondary school media festival.
A claymation short features an older man walking along a street. He is pleased to find an old jukebox with one of his favorite songs in it. He puts a coin in the slot, but needs to insert more money. Not finding any in his pocket, he finds a bottle top on the street, picks it up and pops it into the coin slot, but the jukebox still requires more money. He decides to take off his pincenez and his nose and proceeds to put them into the jukebox, but alas, still not enough money. He proceeds to take his ears off and thankfully the machine starts to play…but can he hear the music?!

group_siblings.title: Barry and the psycho doorstop salesman
The Adventures of Buzz Boy & Buzz Girl
The good, the bad and the animated

results.title: Barry and the psycho doorstop salesman
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This work depicts an animated character, Barry, bored with commercial television. He happily accepts a video game sold to him by an overzealous door to door salesman. Barry becomes enraged when he finds that the game does not work and complains to the salesman the following day. Barry has made a big mistake…as the psychotic salesman stalks Barry and a violent tussle ensues in the dead of night. Barry finally finishes killing the salesman…or has he??

group_siblings.title: The Adventures of Buzz Boy & Buzz Girl
The good, the bad and the animated

results.title: The Adventures of Buzz Boy & Buzz Girl
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
This animated short depicts the adventures between an evil bee and super hero insects. Dr. Bee has hypnotised Buzz Boy to steal for him, after poisoning a peanut and jelly sandwich. Buzz Girl finds out the truth and informs Buzz Boy. Together they set out in search of Dr.Bee. They find him and are caught up in a high speed chase which eventuates in Dr.Bee crashing into the side of a skyscraper.

results.title: Directors of the future
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A ‘mokumentary’ following the trials and tribulations of future ‘Star Director’ Izabella Dazs’ career. We begin the film as she is formulating an idea for her film and we finish by seeing her end product, “Les pommes du mal”.

results.title: Urban poetics
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An abstract visual narrative about 21st century modern living and the absurdity of life. Themes of urban sprawl, desolation, commercialism and the mundanity of routine and the ordinary are all explored in this short film.

results.title: Pavor nocturnus
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
An abstract narrative about dream flashbacks of a disturbing nature. A child survives a car accident in which his father was killed. He has contiinuing mental flashbacks and consequently this makes him fear death. He is bitten on the arm by a fly, and this begins a surreal experience of messages being relayed to him via the fly bites. A surreal thriller where confusion between the dream self and the real self is explored.

results.title: The Hot date
results.brief_description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A put upon adolescent is faced with the unusual problem of potential self-combustion whenever he gets nervous. As a result, his fear is palpable when it comes to his first date. His reluctance is soon overcome as things go well and he decides to invite his love into the bedroom…what happens next is surprising and hilarious!

results.title: Kyrie
results.brief_description:
A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival.
A student called Jack is being framed by another student at his school, who accuses him of stealing his girlfriend. Jack has his exam papers forged, gets drawn into fights and is generally stalked by the jealous boyfriend. Jack cannot seem to prove his innocence and is blamed for everything by the principal of the school who doesn’t believe his stories of persecution….he later finds out why…the girl in question is the school principal’s daughter.
